title: Group portrait of wedding party with men including Guy Jones, Henry Smith, Earl F. Lloyd, best man Earl Dial, groom Theodore B. Lloyd, women including bride Shirley V. Jeffries Lloyd wearing gown with sheer yoke and elbow length sleeves, matron of honor Bertha Frazier, Alma Anderson, Dora Mae Moore, Thelma Lee McKithen, flower girl Shelia or Sheila Frazier, and ring bearer Carl Jeffries Jr., posed in front of dark background, in Harris Studio, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
